store.control

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.control.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a stateless EJB, that is used as a controller between the beans and the ShopUser entity.

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        public java.lang.String createUser(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String pass,
                                   java.lang.String repPass,
                                   java.lang.String email)
        Create a new user after checking the required fields and if user does not already exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The username of the prospective customer.
        pass - The password of the prospective customer
        repPass - The repeated password of the prospective customer.
        email - The email of the prospective customer
        Returns:
        message A message to be displayed regarding success of the registration

      • setCartToUser

        public boolean setCartToUser(java.lang.String username,
                             java.util.List<Gnome> list)
        Set a shopping card to a ShopUser
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user that the cart will be set
        list - The list of Gnomes to be added to the cart
        Returns:
        boolean True if the cart is set, false if not.

      • getAllUsers

        public java.util.List<ShopUser> getAllUsers()
        Get akk users that have registered to the APG Gnome web store
        Returns:
        users The list of the store's users.

      • login

        public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String pass)
        Check requirements for login to the store
        Parameters:
        name - The customer's username
        pass - The customer's password
        Returns:
        message A message to be displayed regarding login success.

        Get ShopUser given the username
        Parameters:
        username - The username of a customer
        Returns:

      • removeFromCart

        public ShopUser removeFromCart(ShopUser u,
                               Gnome g)
        Remove gnomes from a user's cart
        Parameters:
        u - The user from which a gnome will be removed from hers/his cart.
        g - The gnome that will be removed
        Returns:
        myUsr the updated user

                           Gnome gnome)
        Update a customer's shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        u - The user that hers/his cart will be updated
        gnome - The gnome that will be updated
        Returns:
        myUsr The updated instance of ShopUser

      • printUsersCart

        public void printUsersCart(ShopUser usr)
        Print a user's cart in server log. This was used during development for debugging purposes
        Parameters:
        usr - The ShopUser that hers/his cart will be printed.

        bought - The gnomes that were bought

      • getBoughtItemsIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getBoughtItemsIds(ShopUser u)
        Get gnome ids of gnomes that a user has bought
        Parameters:
        u - The current ShopUser
        Returns:
        ids The list of gnome ids a user has bought.
